# Rental Service Website - Full LLM Index

## Purpose
Сайт-каталог домов и бань с формой заявки.

## Source of truth
- Markdown content in `content/`
- Rendering rules in `rules.yaml`
- Telegram lead function in `functions/telegram-lead/`

## Routes
- Home: /
- Houses: /houses/
- Banyas: /banyas/
- Search: /search/

## Discovery and indexing
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml
- Search JSON: /search.json
- LLM index: /llms.txt
